name: Local Motors gmbh
goal:
Local Motors is a ground mobility company focused on shaping the future for the better. Founded in 2007 with a belief in open collaboration and co-creation, Local Motors began low volume vehicle manufacturing of open-source designs using multiple microfactories.
Local Motors is the maker of Olli. Olli is a compliment to current transportation ecosystems providing a solution to current and future transportation inefficiencies, including first-mile/last-mile transport, equity to underserved communities, and offering rider productivity. Above all else, Olli is an experience - a co-created, 3D printed vehicle, with open architecture enabling easy integration of the newest, advanced technologies coming to market.
euInitiatives: LocalMotors acts as vehicle manufacturer therefore is engaged around main EU activities promoted by DG MOVE activities in particular around Horizon 2020, program and future ones.
